name: The Wizard's Tower (itch)
description:
A tower defense game where you brew potions with magical properties to fend off waves of elemental forces.

  • Each potion can take 3 different ingredients, and with 6 possible choices, that means you can create up to 216 unique combinations!
  • Enemies will either march towards your tower or take to the skies!
  • As the waves progress, the forces get stronger and faster.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This is my first released project. I recognize that it's pretty rough, but I certainly learned a lot and I plan to apply it to help make my future games better.
